title: Still need one more font -- please help!
content:
I still need the font for green ridge ranches. Can someone help me identify it?  
Thank you in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Green Ridge Ranches ADVERT TRADER 2box vert.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829182218/http:/typophile.com/files/Green%20Ridge%20Ranches%20ADVERT%20TRADER%202box%20vert_0.png) | 196.7 KB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content: It looks like an emboldened **[Giza Seven Seven](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829182218/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Font-Bureau&ffam=Giza%20SevenSeven%20-%20Regular&fid=bf737306e075e41c4ba3e8d1bd8b5799&fsize=48&text=GREEN%20RIDGE%20RANCHES&wrap=2)** or Giza Seven Nine by David Berlow (Font-Bureau, 1994)

This is the 19th century "Egyptian" by Figgins. There are a number of digital restorations. David Berlow's \_Giza\_ sold by Font Bureau, [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/giza/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829182218/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/giza/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/giza/"),  
has 16 variations including some that would work as a match for Green Ridge Ranches.  
Don
